name: OperationDZ
description:
OperationDZ is a 2D zombie side scroller where players may team up in a squad of 4 to battle against endless waves of the undead, or go solo against the undead. The main goal is to survive for as long as possible. Controls are very simple: W is to jump, A and D is to move left or right, S is to crouch, A + S will make you slide left and S + D will make you slide right. Reload with R, shoot with space bar, and pick up new weapons that are spawned randomly throughout the level with left shift. Good luck! 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
